error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the Tascam unit. Check the IP and Port.

send_command.name: Send Command
send_command.description: Sends a native !7 Tascam protocol command directly to the unit.

command.name: Command String
command.description: The raw command code (e.g., PLY, STP, or !7OSD5).

duration.name: Duration
duration.description: How many seconds to keep the listener active before automatically unregistering.
